name: PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle
desc: Options for how much of the motion and sound content of a Live Photo to play, used in the startPlayback(with:) method and in messages to the viewâ€™s delegate object.

items.name: case undefined
items.desc: This value is invalid for use.

items.name: case full
items.desc: Plays back the entire motion and sound content of the Live Photo, including transition effects at the start and end.

items.name: case hint
items.desc: Plays back only a brief section of the motion content of the Live Photo, without sound.
